title: [Neutral]  eBay may provide pricing, shipping, listing, and other guidance in their Services

tosdr.case: [Neutral]  eBay may provide pricing, shipping, listing, and other guidance in their Services-neutral-undefined
tosdr.tldr: [Neutral]  eBay may provide pricing, shipping, listing, and other guidance in their Services, but only as informational and users are not required to follow it.  eBay also does not guarantee the existence, quality, safety or legality of items advertised; the truth or accuracy of users' content or listings; the ability of sellers to sell items; the ability of buyers to pay for items; or that a buyer or seller will actually complete a transaction or return an item.
